title: Domain Name Registration docs
introduction: Deprecated: Effective 30 June 2023, IBM Cloud will no longer support our Domain Name Registration service, which we offer in partnership with Tucows Inc.

section_highlights.title: What is DNS?
section_highlights.description: The Domain Name System is the part of the internet standard protocol responsible for converting human-friendly domain names into IP addresses.

tiles.title: Domain freeze: In the period between 2 November 2021 - 10 November 2021, for the purpose of migration, your domains are in a frozen state.
Add abuse policy: Added information about reporting violations of the Acceptable Use Policy.
